api_list.api_description: Filter specific data fields from response payload.

required_parameters.name: filter
required_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of data fields to include.

api_list.api_description: Get a list of recent URLs added to URLhaus.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of results returned (max 1000).

query: Retrieve filtered metadata from a technology news site and list some recent suspicious URLs for comparison.
